item.description:
Kaj Kandler will explore Mambo (the CMS that drives www.BostonPHP.org). Topics will include:

Mambo, what is it?
Installing and configuring
Standard functionality
Popular extensions
Exploring the Admin (menus, component, module, mambot)
Creating a template, component, module, mambot
The future

As always, the presentation will follow with Q&A and then move on to a local eating/drinking establishment.

Here are directions:

http://www.bu.edu/it/...

The only change to the directions that is worth noting is that instead
of going to the Front Office everyone should take the stair well down
to the computer lab. To the right after entering the lab are two
doors. The second door on the right is LCR (Left Conference Room).

For more information, see www.BostonPHP.org
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup July Meetup
